version_description:
- Redeem code now doesn't require player to login first
- Shop renewed
- Item UI renewed
- Minor bug fixes

- Japanese language now fully supported
- Fix text line break issue on certain tablet devices
- New items added in shop
- Revised story
- Improved interface when exploring
- Improved sound

We are working hard giving you the best OPUS experience!
- New artifacts to find and repair
- New whispers scattered across the area

We are working hard giving you the best OPUS experience!
- Fix a bug that causes players not to be able to restore purchases.
- Reworked building models and textures in the outside world
- More sound effect has been added to the map for a more immersive experience
- Improved sound quality for headphone users
- Due to the size of this update, it is required that the players allow permission for read/write data in order to play the game.

We are working hard giving you the best OPUS experience!
- New artifacts to find and repair
- New whispers scattered across the area
- New items and pets for purchase

We are working hard giving you the best OPUS experience!
- 11 brand new side quests (End-Game Content)
- Directorâ€™s Commentary (End-Game Content)
- New IAP bundle packs with better value
- Characters remodeled in 3D
- Watch an ad to receive a free Soul Stone

- Fix performance issues
- Improved Director's Commentary interface
- You can now enable notifications for watching Ads for Soul Stones
